com.jsaragih

Class FDet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jsaragih.FDet

  • public class FDet
extends Object
    Face detector.

    Note: the face detector in any input file is ignored and is replaced by the haarcascade_frontalface_alt2 cascade.

    Author:
    Jason Mora Saragih, Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
